product_name: The Cat in the Hat's Learning Library: There's a Map on My Lap!
long_description: Grab this book and take a look at maps and grids and scales and keys. You'll learn how to get from Maine to Belize! Author: Tish Rabe; Illustrator: Aristides Ruiz. Hardcover; 45 pages; full-color illustrations. Dr. Seuss Enterprises; copyright 2002. Bridges the gap between "concept" books for preschoolers and nonfiction books for fluent readers.
short_description: Grab this book and take a look at maps and grids and scales and keys. You'll learn how to get from Maine to Belize!
